content.html:
brew install redis

To have launchd start redis now and restart at login:
  brew services start redis
Or, if you don't want/need a background service you can just run:
  redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf

可以编辑 /usr/local/etc/redis.conf， 设置 redis 密码 requirepass

启动：

# redis-server
redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf

127.0.0.1:6379> pfadd mykey a b c
(integer) 1
127.0.0.1:6379> pfcount mykey
(integer) 3
127.0.0.1:6379> pfadd mykey2 a b c c d
(integer) 1
127.0.0.1:6379> pfcount mykey2
(integer) 4
127.0.0.1:6379>

批量删除某一类 key

redis-cli -h 10.0.0.200 -a 'verycomplexpassword' -n 3 KEYS 'ST_*Qr*' | xargs redis-cli -h 10.0.0.200 -a 'verycomplexpassword' -n 3  DEL

或者

redis-cli -h [127.0.0.1](127.0.0.1) -p 8177

进入后输入 auth 进行验证。
content.text:
brew install redis
To have launchd start redis now and restart at login: brew services start redis Or, if you don't want/need a background service you can just run: redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf 可以编辑 /usr/local/etc/redis.conf， 设置 redis 密码 requirepass
启动：
# redis-server redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf 127.0.0.1:6379> pfadd mykey a b c (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> pfcount mykey (integer) 3 127.0.0.1:6379> pfadd mykey2 a b c c d (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> pfcount mykey2 (integer) 4 127.0.0.1:6379> 批量删除某一类 key
redis-cli -h 10.0.0.200 -a 'verycomplexpassword' -n 3 KEYS 'ST_*Qr*' | xargs redis-cli -h 10.0.0.200 -a 'verycomplexpassword' -n 3 DEL 或者
redis-cli -h [127.0.0.1](127.0.0.1) -p 8177 进入后输入 auth 进行验证。

name: 给 redis 设置密码
summary:
brew install redis
To have launchd start redis now and restart at login: brew services start redis Or, if you don't want/need a background service you can just run: redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf 可以编辑 /usr/local/etc/redis.conf， 设置 redis 密码 requirepass
启动：
# redis-server redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf 127.0.0.1:6379> pfadd mykey a b c (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> pfcount mykey (integer) 3 127.0.0.1:6379> pfadd mykey2 a b c c d (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> pfcount mykey2 (integer) 4 127.
